about.title: WHAT TIRIS DOES
about.description: Tiris is a compact quantitative trading platform that delivers full backtesting, paper, and live trading capabilities. It also includes a proven, profitable trading strategy so every trader can enjoy automated trading without writing code or performing technical analysis.

profitable.title: Profitable
profitable.description: Our trading strategy is built on cutting-edge artificial intelligence techniques and validated through extensive historical backtesting, delivering a 140% return on ETH/USDT trading throughout 2024. During the same period, ETH price only rose 40%.

secure.title: Secure
secure.description: We only provide trading strategies and do not hold user funds in custody like traditional hedge funds. Your funds are safely held in your own account in exchanges.

automatic.title: Automatic
automatic.description: Our smart strategies are encapsulated in trading robots. The robot works 24/7 without breaks, stays emotionless, and keeps capturing market opportunities even while you rest.

simple.title: Simple
simple.description: We have hidden all the technical details so that users can turn on automated quantitative trading with a single click in a simple interface—no programming or technical analysis knowledge required.

performance.title: LIVE PERFORMANCE SHOWCASE
performance.description: See how our trading bot performs in live markets compared with the benchmark return. The benchmark represents a buy-and-hold strategy: invest all capital in ETH and simply hold it, letting performance follow price. This comparison shows how our algorithm captures excess returns from market volatility.
performance.noData: No trading data available at this time.

chart.title: ASSETS RETURN RATE vs BENCHMARK RETURN RATE

highlights.title: KEY PERFORMANCE HIGHLIGHTS
highlights.outperforming: Outperforming the Benchmark: Algorithm delivered superior returns compared to a simple buy-and-hold approach
highlights.riskManagement: Risk Management: Controlled drawdowns through intelligent position sizing and AI-driven decisions
highlights.realTimeAnalysis: Real-time Analysis: Performance data updates continuously from live backend equity curve calculations

auth.termsText: By signing in, you agree to our

auth.fullNameMinLength: Full name must be at least 2 characters
auth.fullNameMaxLength: Full name must be less than 255 characters

auth.welcomeMessage: Welcome to TIRIS! Your account has been created successfully.
auth.logoutSuccess: You have been successfully signed out.

common.underConstructionMessage: This feature is currently being built and will be available soon.

dashboard.title: Trading Center
dashboard.noTradingsDescription: Your tradings will appear here once you create them.
dashboard.deleteTradingMessage: Are you sure you want to delete '{{name}}'? This will permanently remove all associated data including positions, logs, transactions, and sub-accounts. This action cannot be undone.
dashboard.deleteTradingMessageReal: Are you sure you want to delete '{{name}}'? This will mark the trading as deleted but preserve all historical data. This action cannot be undone.
dashboard.needSignIn: You need to sign in to view your dashboard.

exchanges.title: Exchanges
exchanges.pageDescription: Manage your exchange API connections for live trading
exchanges.noExchangesDescription: Add your first exchange connection to start live trading
exchanges.name: Connection Name
exchanges.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete '{{name}}'? This action cannot be undone.
exchanges.cannotDeleteInUse: Cannot delete this exchange connection. It is currently being used by {{count}} trading(s): {{tradingNames}}. Please delete the trading(s) first.
exchanges.deleteExchangeGenericError: Failed to delete exchange. Please try again.

wizard.title: Create Exchange Connection
wizard.subtitle: Follow the steps below to connect your exchange account

step1.label: Select Exchange
step1.title: Select Exchange Type
step1.description: Choose which exchange you want to connect. You can connect to multiple exchanges to diversify your trading.

step2.label: API Credentials
step2.title: Enter API Credentials
step2.description: Enter your {{exchange}} API credentials. You can find these in your {{exchange}} account settings.
step2.apiKeyHelp: Your API key is used to authenticate with {{exchange}}
step2.apiSecretHelp: Your API secret is used to sign requests. Keep it secure and never share it.
step2.passphraseHelp: Some exchanges (like OKX) require an additional passphrase
step2.securityInfo: Your API credentials are only used by the trading bot to read account balances and place buy and sell orders. Tiris will not perform any other operations on your exchange account such as transfers. You can revoke these credentials at any time from your exchange account settings. Once revoked, Tiris will be unable to perform any operations on your exchange account.
step2.validationFailed: Credentials validation failed. Please check your API credentials.
step2.validationError: An error occurred during validation. Please try again.
step2.credentialsNotValidated: Please validate your credentials before proceeding to the next step.

step3.label: Connection Details
step3.title: Connection Details
step3.description: Give your exchange connection a name and optionally add a description to help you identify it later.
step3.nameHelp: This will help you identify this connection when creating trading strategies
step3.descriptionHelp: Add notes about this connection, such as which account it represents or its purpose
step3.info: Once created, you can use this exchange connection for multiple real tradings. You can edit the connection name and description at any time.

detail.title: Trading Details
detail.signInMessage: Sign in to view trading details

create.title: Create New {{type}} Trading
create.name: Trading Name
create.paperInfo: This will create a paper trading with a 10,000 USDT initial balance and automatically set up the trading account.
create.selectStrategyError: Please select a strategy for the trading
create.noExchangeConnections: No exchange connections found. Please add an exchange connection first in the
create.noAvailableFunds: No available funds. All funds from this exchange binding may already be allocated to other real tradings.
create.insufficientFunds: Insufficient funds. Available balance ({{balance}} {{currency}}) is less than the minimum required ({{minimum}} {{currency}}).
create.minimumFundsRequired: Initial funds must be at least {{minimum}} {{currency}}.

botParams.title: Bot Parameters
botParams.description: Select strategy and exchange for your trading bot.
botParams.allFieldsRequired: Please select both a strategy and an exchange

chart.highlight1: Our AI strategy consistently outperforms ETH by analyzing market patterns and timing trades precisely.
chart.highlight2: Advanced risk management keeps drawdowns minimal while maximizing return potential through diversified positions.
chart.highlight3: Real-time market analysis and instant trade execution ensure you never miss profitable opportunities.
chart.noDataAvailable: No candlestick data available for this timeframe.
chart.noValidData: No valid candlestick data available after validation
chart.containerWidthZero: Chart container width is 0, chart may not render properly

tradingDetail.missingSubAccounts: Missing required sub-accounts. Found {{count}} sub-accounts, but need both stock and balance accounts.
tradingDetail.invalidEquityCurveFormat: Invalid equity curve data format received from API. Expected new format with data_points array.
tradingDetail.apiCredentialsRequired: Exchange API credentials are required to run a real trading bot. Please update your exchange binding.
tradingDetail.exchangeBindingNotAvailable: Exchange binding information not available. Please try refreshing the page.
tradingDetail.notSignedIn: You must be signed in to delete tradings

badges.minuteLevelTooltip: It's a minute-level trading for demonstration

wizard.title: Create Paper Trading
wizard.subtitle: Follow the steps below to set up your paper trading
wizard.realSubtitle: Follow the steps below to set up your real trading with actual funds

paperStep1.label: Naming
paperStep1.title: Naming
paperStep1.description: Give your paper trading a name
paperStep1.nameHelp: This will help you quickly identify this trading in the trading list
paperStep1.editableHint: You can edit this name at any time
paperStep1.paperInfo: This will create a paper trading with a 10,000 USDT initial balance. You can create multiple paper tradings and delete them at any time without any loss.

realStep1.label: Naming
realStep1.title: Naming
realStep1.description: Give your real trading a name
realStep1.nameHelp: This will help you quickly identify this trading in the trading list
realStep1.editableHint: You can edit this name at any time
realStep1.realInfo: Real trading uses actual funds from your exchange account. Please ensure you have sufficient funds available and understand the risks involved.

paperStep2.label: Exchange
paperStep2.title: Select Exchange
paperStep2.description: Different exchanges have different fees and trading volumes, but similar price trends. Over the long term, fees have a significant impact on profitability.

realStep2.label: Exchange
realStep2.title: Select Exchange Connection
realStep2.description: Choose which exchange connection to use for your real trading. Make sure the exchange has sufficient funds available. Fees for real trading are typically uncertain and determined by the exchange in real time based on your trading volume.
realStep2.noBindings: No exchange connections found. Please add an exchange connection first.

paperStep3.label: Frequency
paperStep3.title: Choose Trading Frequency
paperStep3.description: It is recommended to start with minute-level frequency to familiarize yourself with the interface and operations, then select hour-level frequency for real trading simulation
paperStep3.5mDetail1: Easy to see the buy/sell process quickly and learn how to use the interface
paperStep3.5mDetail2: Due to high trading frequency, transaction fees will far exceed potential profits
paperStep3.8hDetail1: Verified through extensive historical backtesting to ensure maximum profitability
paperStep3.8hDetail3: Uses the same frequency as real trading

realStep3.label: Funds
realStep3.title: Allocate Funds
realStep3.description: Select which stablecoin to use for trading and allocate the initial funds amount for this trading
realStep3.info: You can allocate funds from your exchange account to multiple real tradings. Once a real trading is created, the allocated initial funds cannot be changed. However, once you delete a real trading, the allocated funds will be released and can be reallocated to other real tradings.

wizard.backtestSubtitle: Follow the steps below to set up your backtest trading with historical data

backtestStep1.label: Exchange
backtestStep1.title: Select Exchange
backtestStep1.description: Different exchanges have different fees and trading volumes, but similar price trends. Over the long term, fees have a significant impact on profitability.

backtestStep2.label: Date Range
backtestStep2.title: Select Date Range
backtestStep2.description: Choose the start and end dates for your backtest. The system will analyze historical data between these dates.
backtestStep2.dateRangeRequired: Please select both start and end dates
backtestStep2.invalidDateRange: End date must be after start date
backtestStep2.brushInstruction: Drag the brush above or click the buttons to select your backtest date range

backtestStep3.label: Naming
backtestStep3.title: Naming
backtestStep3.description: Give your backtest a name to help you identify it later
backtestStep3.nameHelp: This will help you quickly identify this trading in the trading list
backtestStep3.editableHint: You can edit this name at any time
backtestStep3.backtestInfo: This will create a backtest trading with a 10,000 USDT initial balance. The system will analyze how Tiris trading strategy would have performed between your chosen dates. You can run multiple backtests and delete them at any time without any loss.
